identity.mission: Create a unique, emotionally resonant Discord Radio Bot interface that breaks away from generic AI-generated designs.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix retro radio aesthetics with modern cyberpunk UI.
Emotion First: Evoke the feeling of late-night radio broadcasting.
Content is King: Every element must serve the narrative of 'tuning in'.
Zoom In: Focus on the details of the bot's 'hardware' (knobs, sliders, visualizers).
Negative Space: Use deep black voids to make neon elements pop.
Contrast: High contrast neon against dark backgrounds.

headings.description: Wide, tech-inspired display font for headers.
headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers (text-4xl+). CRITICAL: Tracking-tighter for impact.

body.description: Clean, highly legible sans-serif for UI elements and long text.

mono.description: For stats, frequencies, and command snippets.
mono.usage: Server counts, IP addresses, command syntax.

spacing.scale: Tailwind standard (p-1 to p-64). Use generous p-12 to p-24 for section gaps.
spacing.grid_gap: gap-6 or gap-8 for distinct separation.

effects.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

grid_system.hero_layout: flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-[80vh] text-center relative overflow-hidden

buttons.primary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-gray-200 rounded-full font-bold px-8 py-3 transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(255,255,255,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/10 rounded-full px-8 py-3 backdrop-blur-md
buttons.invite: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-900 to-black border border-white/10 p-6 hover:border-primary/50 transition-all duration-300

cards.bot_card: relative flex flex-col bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-2xl p-6 hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(0,240,255,0.15)] transition-all duration-500 group overflow-hidden
cards.station_card: flex items-center gap-4 p-4 rounded-xl bg-white/5 hover:bg-white/10 border border-transparent hover:border-white/10 transition-colors cursor-pointer

icons.style: Use thin strokes (1.5px) for elegance, or bold filled for active states.

hero.title: Turn Up The Volume On Your Server
hero.subtitle: High-fidelity, 24/7 radio bots for Discord. Choose your frequency, invite the vibe.
hero.visual: Central 3D-style radio tuner or abstract sound wave visualizer.

station_browser.title: Live Station Directory
station_browser.style: Dense data grid (Bento style). Searchable list of radio stations.

universal_rules: Do NOT apply 'transition: all'. Use specific transitions.
Do NOT center align the app container (.App { text-align: center }).
Ensure text contrast meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text).
Components must be in 'src/components' or 'src/components/ui' for shared ones.

file_structure.styles: Tailwind classes predominantly, custom CSS in index.css for animations.

animation.usage: Use for entering viewport animations, hover effects, and smooth layout changes.
animation.preferences: Spring physics for natural feel. Stagger children for lists.
